blogPost.excerpt: Focus on the three most important tasks every day. To be really effective you have to pick up the three most significant tasks per day. A massive productivity improvement and considered by many experts to be the best to-do strategy. Look it up!
blogPost.body: Focus on the three most important tasks every day. To be really effective you have to pick up the three most significant tasks per day. A massive productivity improvement and considered by many experts to be the best to-do strategy. Look it up!
blogPost.title: 3 Things - Focus on the 3 most important things today
blogPost.author: Marta

localize.description: 每天专注于三个最重要的任务。要想真正提高工作效率，你必须每天拿起最重要的三项任务。大幅度提高生产力，被很多专家认为是最好的待办事项策略。看看吧!
localize.tagline: 专注于今天最重要的3件事

localize.description: 每天專注於三個最重要的任務。要想真正提高工作效率，你必須每天拿起最重要的三項任務。大幅度提高生產力，被很多專家認爲是最好的待辦事項策略。看看吧!
localize.tagline: 專注於今天最重要的3件事

previous.excerpt: You know, you really shouldn't have to settle for emojis that only kind-of express how you feel. Punctuate your deepest sentiments and pull off those more-subtle remarks with this Very Necessary (and expanding) iMessage sticker pack.
previous.title: Very Necessary Emojis - For very sarcastic people

localize.description: 你知道，你真的不应该满足于那些只能表达你感受的表情符号。用这个 "非常必要"(和扩展的)iMessage贴纸包来点缀你最深沉的情感，并拉出那些更微妙的评论。
你知道，你真的不應該滿足於那些只能表達你感受的表情符號。用這個 "非常必要"(和擴展的)iMessage貼紙包來點綴你最深沉的情感，並拉出那些更微妙的評論。

next.excerpt: Use all your favorite web apps in Wavebox instead of Chrome and save 90 minutes per day by automating tasks and staying focused. Wavebox has everything you need to work faster across Slack, Asana, Trello, and every other app you use to get work done.
next.title: Wavebox - All your favorite web apps in Wavebox instead of Chrome

localize.description: 在Wavebox中使用您最喜爱的所有Web应用程序，而不是Chrome，并通过自动化任务和保持专注，每天节省90分钟。Wavebox拥有您所需的一切，可以让您在Slack、Asana、Trello以及其他所有您用来完成工作的应用程序中更快地工作。
localize.tagline: 所有你喜欢的网络应用都在Wavebox中，而不是在Chrome中。

localize.description: 在Wavebox中使用您最喜愛的所有Web應用程序，而不是Chrome，並通過自動化任務和保持專注，每天節省90分鐘。Wavebox擁有您所需的一切，可以讓您在Slack、Asana、Trello以及其他所有您用來完成工作的應用程序中更快地工作。
localize.tagline: 所有你喜歡的網絡應用都在Wavebox中，而不是在Chrome中。
